about_the_game:
24 haunting tracks from Resident Evil 3 and 21 spine-chilling tracks from Resident Evil Resistance combine to make a soundtrack befitting of survival horror.

The 108+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
